hero.title: Premium Industrial Packaging Solutions
hero.subtitle: Leading provider of innovative wooden packaging solutions for industrial applications. We deliver quality, reliability, and efficiency for your packaging needs.

coreValues.title: Quality Packaging
coreValues.description: We provide high-quality wooden and specialized packaging solutions that ensure product safety and integrity during transport and storage.

coreValues.title: ISPM-15 Compliance
coreValues.description: Our wooden packaging solutions are ISPM-15 Treatments with proper heat treatment and fumigation for international shipping.

coreValues.title: Timely Delivery
coreValues.description: We understand the importance of on-time delivery and maintain efficient supply chain operations for all packaging needs.

coreValues.title: Industry Standards
coreValues.description: All our packaging solutions comply with international quality standards and export regulations for global markets.

services.title: Wooden Packaging Solutions
services.description: Premium wooden packaging and crate solutions for heavy-duty industrial applications and export requirements.

services.title: Wooden Pallet Solutions
services.description: Comprehensive range of wooden pallets designed for efficient material handling and storage solutions.

services.title: Specialized Packaging Solutions
services.description: Advanced packaging solutions for specific industries including electronics, automotive, and chemical applications.

services.title: Treatment Services
services.description: Professional treatment services and certifications for wooden packaging materials as per international standards.

services.title: Custom & Support Services
services.description: Tailored packaging solutions and comprehensive support services for unique requirements and material handling.

process.title: Consultation
process.description: We understand your packaging requirements, dimensions, and shipping needs.

process.title: Design & Planning
process.description: We design custom packaging solutions and plan materials, treatments, and specifications.

process.title: Manufacturing
process.description: We craft packaging using premium materials with proper treatments and quality controls.

process.title: Delivery & Support
process.description: We deliver certified packaging on time with complete documentation and ongoing support.

testimonials.name: Rajesh Kumar
testimonials.content: Om India's seaworthy wooden box packaging has been perfect for our heavy machinery exports. ISPM-15 Treatments and excellent quality.

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.content: Their VCI packaging and aluminum foil vacuum packing have significantly reduced corrosion issues. Very professional service.

testimonials.name: Amit Patel
testimonials.content: Excellent wooden crates and pallets. The heat treatment certification made our export process smooth and compliant.
